web

Class View

  • java.lang.Object
    • web.View
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    TemplateView

    public class View
extends java.lang.Object
    Implements the view from the MVC schema. Uses a ViewEngine to process the request and return a response.
    Author:
    Yohan Chalier
